Title: New directions: Editors’ overview
Source: Land-use/Transport Plan. In Hong Kong: A Review of Principles and Practices
Abstract: © Harry T. Dimitriou and Alison H.S. Cook 1998. All rights reserved.Following Part 3 which focused on particular plans and policies for land use and transportation in Hong Kong, this final group of chapters reflects on current issues and new directions that the territory might take.
